name: Huang Zitao
description:
'''Huang Zitao''' ({{lang-zh|s=黄子韬|p=Huáng Zǐtāo}}; born May 2, 1993), also known by his stage name '''Tao''', is a Chinese rapper, singer, producer and actor. He is a former member of the South Korean-Chinese boy band [[Exo]] and its Chinese sub-unit, Exo-M. After leaving Exo, he made his solo debut in China in 2015 with the mini-album ''[[T.A.O (EP)|TAO]]'', under the stage name '''Z.Tao'''. Huang made his acting debut in the romantic movie ''[[You Are My Sunshine (2015 film)|You Are My Sunshine]]'', followed by TV series ''[[Negotiator (TV series)|Negotiator]]'' and ''[[The Brightest Star in the Sky]]''.

Huang ranked 25th on ''[[Forbes]]'' [[Forbes China Celebrity 100|China Celebrity 100]] list in 2017, 35th in 2019, and 37th in 2020.
